words.source: H559 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'said', ESV 'said', NASB 'said'
H4872 proper name; all trans. agree
H6547 prep. l- + proper name; KJV 'unto Pharaoh', ESV 'to Pharaoh', NASB 'to Pharaoh'
H6286 Hithpael imv. 2ms of פָּאַר 'to glorify, adorn'; KJV 'glory over me', ESV 'be pleased to command me', NASB 'the honor is yours to tell me'
H5921 prep. ʿal 'over' + 1cs suff.; KJV 'over me', ESV 'me', NASB 'me'
H4970 prep. l- + interrog. matay 'when?'; KJV 'when', ESV 'when', NASB 'when'
H6279 Hiphil impf. 1cs of עָתַר 'to pray, entreat'; KJV 'shall I intreat', ESV 'shall I plead', NASB 'shall I entreat'
prep. l- + 2ms suff. 'for you'; KJV 'for thee', ESV 'for you', NASB 'for you'
H5650 conj. + prep. l- + n.mp construct ʿeved 'servant' + 2ms suff.; KJV 'for thy servants', ESV 'for your servants', NASB 'for your servants'
H5971 conj. + prep. l- + n.ms construct ʿam 'people' + 2ms suff.; KJV 'for thy people', ESV 'for your people', NASB 'for your people'
H3772 prep. l- + Hiphil inf. construct of כָּרַת 'to cut off, destroy'; KJV 'to destroy', ESV 'to get rid of', NASB 'to destroy'
H6854 art. + n.fp tsephardeyaʿ 'frog'; KJV 'the frogs', ESV 'the frogs', NASB 'the frogs'
H4480 prep. min 'from' + 2ms suff.; KJV 'from thee', ESV 'from you', NASB 'from you'
H1004 conj. + prep. min + n.mp construct bayit 'house' + 2ms suff.; KJV 'from thy houses', ESV 'from your houses', NASB 'from your houses'
H7535 adv. raq 'only, surely'; KJV 'only', ESV 'only', NASB 'only'
H2975 prep. b- + art. + n.ms yeʾor 'Nile'; KJV 'in the river', ESV 'in the Nile', NASB 'in the Nile'
H7604 Niphal impf. 3fp of שָׁאַר 'to remain, be left over'; KJV 'they shall remain', ESV 'be left', NASB 'they will be left'
